actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on certain ceramic statues, statuettes, and hand-made flowers.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on porcelain or china statues, statuettes, and handmade flowers valued over $2.50 each and produced by professional sculptors.

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on certain ceramic statues, statuettes, and hand-made flowers.
